verses.verse: And it came to pass after <S%H310>this<s%>, that <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H6213>prepared<s%> him <S%H4818>chariots<s%> and <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And <S%H53>Absalom<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>: and it was so, that when any <S%H376>man<s%> that had a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, then <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Of <S%H335>what<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> art thou? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> is of <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H7200>See<s%>, thy <S%H1697>matters<s%> are <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H5228>right<s%>; but there is no man deputed of the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> thee.

<S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> moreover, Oh that I were <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, that every <S%H376>man<s%> which hath any <S%H7379>suit<s%> or <S%H4941>cause<s%> might <S%H935>come<s%> unto me, and I would do him <S%H6663>justice<s%>!

And it was so, that when any <S%H376>man<s%> came <S%H7126>nigh<s%> to him to do him <S%H7812>obeisance<s%>, he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H2388>took<s%> him, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him.

And on this <S%H1697>manner<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment<s%>: so <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H1589>stole<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, that <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, I pray thee, let me <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vow<s%>, which I have <S%H5087>vowed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>.

For thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> while I <S%H3427>abode<s%> at <S%H1650>Geshur<s%> in <S%H758>Syria<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall bring me <S%H7725%H7725>again<s%> indeed to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, then I will <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3212>Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>. So he <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>.

¶ But <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7270>spies<s%> throughout all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, As soon as ye <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, then ye shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H4427>reigneth<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>.

And with <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that were <S%H7121>called<s%>; and they <S%H1980>went<s%> in their <S%H8537>simplicity<s%>, and they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not any <S%H1697>thing<s%>.

And <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> for <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> the <S%H1526>Gilonite<s%>, <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H3289>counseller<s%>, from his <S%H5892>city<s%>, even from <S%H1542>Giloh<s%>, while he <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>. And the <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> was <S%H533>strong<s%>; for the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7227>increased<s%> <S%H1980>continually<s%> with <S%H53>Absalom<s%>.

¶ And there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H5046>messenger<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto all his <S%H5650>servants<s%> that were with him at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, and let us <S%H1272>flee<s%>; for we shall not else <S%H6413>escape<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%>: make <S%H4116>speed<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%>, lest he <S%H5381>overtake<s%> us <S%H4116>suddenly<s%>, and <S%H5080>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon us, and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Behold, thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> are ready to do whatsoever my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H977>appoint<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and all his <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H7272>after<s%> him. And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H802>women<s%>, which were <S%H6370>concubines<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7272>after<s%> him, and <S%H5975>tarried<s%> in a <S%H1004>place<s%> that was far <S%H4801%H1023>off<s%>.

And all his <S%H5650>servants<s%> passed <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> him; and all the <S%H3774>Cherethites<s%>, and all the <S%H6432>Pelethites<s%>, and all the <S%H1663>Gittites<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> which <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H7272>after<s%> him from <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, passed <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H863>Ittai<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite<s%>, Wherefore <S%H3212>goest<s%> thou also with us? <S%H7725>return<s%> to thy <S%H4725>place<s%>, and <S%H3427>abide<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%>: for thou art a <S%H5237>stranger<s%>, and also an <S%H1540>exile<s%>.

Whereas thou <S%H935>camest<s%> but <S%H8543>yesterday<s%>, should I this <S%H3117>day<s%> make thee <S%H3212>go<s%> up and <S%H5128%H5128>down<s%> with us? seeing I <S%H1980>go<s%> whither I may, <S%H7725>return<s%> thou, and take <S%H7725>back<s%> thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>: <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> be with thee.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H863>Ittai<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> and pass <S%H5674>over<s%>. And <S%H863>Ittai<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%>, and all his <S%H582>men<s%>, and all the little <S%H2945>ones<s%> that were with him.

¶ And lo <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> also, and all the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were with him, <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: and they set <S%H3332>down<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%>, until all the <S%H5971>people<s%> had <S%H8552>done<s%> <S%H5674>passing<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>, Carry <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>: if I shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favour<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, he will bring me <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H7200>shew<s%> me both it, and his <S%H5116>habitation<s%>:
But if he thus <S%H559>say<s%>, I have no <S%H2654>delight<s%> in thee; behold, here am I, let him <S%H6213>do<s%> to me as <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> unto him.

¶ And <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of mount <S%H2132>Olivet<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%> as he went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and had his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H2645>covered<s%>, and he <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H3182>barefoot<s%>: and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that was with him <S%H2645>covered<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and they went <S%H5927>up<s%>, <S%H1058>weeping<s%> as they went <S%H5927>up<s%>.
